2. Close plugin
3. Reopen it
4. Reversed is not toggled
5. Add new sample
6. Return to first
7. Reversed state toggled

items.body: If you try to play some note repeatedly with small delay, you found that it cause some sound artifacts.

items.body: For some reason, if you change right sample active region marker, it will stick to some point and you won't be able to change it to the right

items.title: [0.1] Keys on pianoroll don't turn off
items.body:
How to reproduce:

1. Press any key on pianoroll or play midi note
2. When note is off, key is still marked as active

items.title: [0.3] Draw ADSR lines on SampleViewer
[0.1] Octave switcher for piano roll
[0.1] Glide effect
missing #include <cassert>
items.body:
Error when compile under Linux with gcc 9.1.1

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. git clone Soompler
2. projucer --resave Soompler.jucer
3. make
4. 

> ../../Source/LinearPanel.cpp:76:5: error: ‘assert’ was not declared in this scope
>    76 |     assert(padding >= 0);
>       |     ^~~~~~
> ../../Source/LinearPanel.cpp:13:1: note: ‘assert’ is defined in header ‘<cassert>’; did you forget to ‘#include <cassert>’?
>    12 | #include "Settings.h"
>   +++ |+#include <cassert>
>    13 |


**Expected behavior**
compile


**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OpenSUSE TW GCC 9.1.1
 - JUCE 5.4.4

adding #include <cassert> into Source/LinearPanel.cpp solves this issue

items.title: [0.0.5] Clicks when playing samples
items.body: Clicks are noticeable when new note begin to play

items.title: [0.0.5] Volume (and other knobs?) send wrong values to controller
items.body: Volume is very loud on low position and super-distorted on high. SoomplerKnob class is first one to blame.

items.title: Features of v0.0.5
[0.0.5] Plugin state doesn't restored after reopening project
items.body:
Steps to reproduce: 

1. work with plugin
2. close project
3. open project again
4. go to soompler instance
5. all gui state reset

items.title: [0.0.5] Reverse button paint state doesn't got reset when load new sample
items.body:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Load sample
2. Turn reverse on 
3. Load new sample
4. While reverse mode is not working, toggle button stays toggled

items.title: [0.0.5] Reverse button doesn't change thumbnail when sample is long
items.body: Reverse doesn't work with some long samples

items.title: [0.0.5] Preview of sample doesn't work until first sample is loaded
items.body:
Steps to reproduce:

- Open fresh instance of plugin
- Choose any sample and press play button or turn on autoplay and select any sample
- No sound output, even if all audio settings valid

- Load any sample by clicking on it with double click
- Now preview works as it should

items.title: [0.0.5] Glitches on knob labels on MacOS
items.body: Labels contain typos in some words, for example, I got "Defcay" knob instead of "Decay", "Rflfasf" instead of "Realease" and so one. I think problem might be in TRANS method, located in knob  initialization code.

items.title: [0.0.4] Reverse and loop mode parameters should reset after new sound loaded
[0.0.4] Thumbnail doesn't reverse
[0.0.4] attack time is too big, change max value
[0.0.4] Adsr parameters not restored when reopen project
[0.0.4] Pianoroll octave numeration is wrong
items.body: In Tracktion 7 C4 note is C3 note in Soompler

items.title: [0.0.4] When plugin state restored, adsr params is not correct
items.body: Attack should be 0, but it restored as 0.1 and the same thing with other ADSR params

items.title: [0.0.4] SampleViewer range lines too narrow for comfort changing
[0.0.4] Piano roll settings restore incorrectly
items.body: Markers restore wrong way, makin plugin not usable.

items.title: V0.0.4 bug fixes
[0.0.4] Crashed when load sample after plugin reload
items.body: I loaded first sample into plugin and closed gui, reopened it, loaded new sample and it crashed

items.title: [0.0.4] Plugin state reset when reopen project in Tracktion
items.body: When reopen project in Tracktion 7 plugin state is not recovered

items.title: [0.0.4] Thumbnail quality degrades when reverse mode on
[0.0.4] Cannot change knob parameters when midi lines is playing
items.body: All knob changes ignored while midi notes comes from daw, only when I forced with pushing note on pianoroll i was able to get it to work.

items.title: [0.2] Mixer tab for mixing multiple voices
[0.1] Multiple samples loaded
[0.0.5] Make sample browser
[0.0.5] Restrict loading of big samples
items.body: Current behaviour is somewhat confusing, because it just doesn't let you move active sample region further than it loaded into memory (about 30 seconds). Need a better user-friendly approach. I think we can restrict sample size before loading and show user a error message if size exceeded.

items.title: [0.0.4] Make all knobs and buttons processor parameters
items.body: It required for persistent gui and processor state

items.title: [0.0.4] Test plugin on Linux, MacOS and Windows
[0.0.4] Tooltips is missing on every component
[0.0.4] When reopen plugin in Tracktion sample unloaded
items.body:
In Tracktion 7 on MacOS 10.14 when reopen plugin loaded sample is gone. 

Steps to reproduce:

1. Add plugin to track in Tracktion7
2. Load some sample and close plugin
3. Open plugin again - sample viewer is gone, message says "load sample ...", but sound persist, like sample is loaded.

items.title: [0.0.4] Cannot drag sample from Tracktion file browser
items.body: drag not working when dragging from Tracktion, check if we can enable dragging from Tracktion 7

items.title: [0.0.4] About button is enabled but not working
items.body:
**Describe the bug**
About button is now enabled but nothing happens when you are trying to press it.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Start the app.
2. Try to click a button with a question mark symbol.

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
- OS: Manjaro Linux

items.title: [0.1] Improve the UI design a bit
items.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
The UI is poorly designed.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
More user friendly and elegant design.

items.title: [0.0.4] Controls are enabled by default but useless
items.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Control widgets such as volume, attack level etc. are enabled by default but you can't use it before you loaded a file. 

**Describe the solution you'd like**
I'd like to see no controls before a file is loaded.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Alternative is to disable (make grey or smth) by default.

**Additional context**

items.title: [0.0.4] Loop button is visible when disabled
items.body:
**Describe the bug**
Loop button is disabled by default and is unremarkable. 

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Open the app.

**Expected behavior**
Loop button is hidden by default.

**Screenshots**
-

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Linux Manjaro 
 - Version: the last

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.

items.title: [0.0.4] Assert when changing min sample note
V0.0.4 development branch merging
items.body: I think we can skip per-pr based reviews cos issues are repeated. I think there will be release for refactor purposes and for any code-style things.

items.title: [0.0.4] Tell user that he or she can also drag sample
items.body: Now message tells only to load with open sample button, but with 4 alpha version you can now drag sample.

items.title: [0.0.4] Make drag icon when hovering on draggable element
items.body: PianoRoll and SampleViewers have range lines, that can be dragged, so when mouse is hovered upon them icon must be changed to tell user that this item is draggable

items.body: Need to credit every icon's author

items.body: Move root note to C3 on the screen

items.title: [0.0.3] Volume control doesn't work when playing on midi keyboard
[0.0.3] Long samples (> 3m) takes very long to load
items.body: We can restrict sample length to 30sec or so, because it's regular case for sampler plugin, but need to somehow clip big files automatically.

items.title: [0.0.3] Slow UI
items.body: UI is pretty slow on my laptop (celeron ivy bridge). Maybe timer delay can be decreased to get more fps.

items.body: Need to expose any critical bugs

items.title: [0.0.3] Some object leaking in PianoRoll class
[0.0.3] Slow changing of sample active region
items.body:
How to reproduce:

1. Load any long sample > 2m
2. Try to change start or end position
3. if your computer as slow as my laptop (some celeron processor) you maybe reproduced the bug

items.title: [0.0.3] Remove all compile-warnings
items.body: There are plenty of them

items.title: [0.0.3] Freezes when thumbnail is loaded
items.body: For big files process can take some time (4-5 sec on my g2020), and this causes some freezes on my system (Elementary OS 5.0). Can try reduce number of cached samples in Thumbnail cache or make it async if that's the problem.

items.title: [0.0.3] Add pianoroll
items.body: In pianoroll we can display current non-pitched note of sample (its original pitch in future). And note range that can be applied to this sample.

items.title: [0.0.3] Rework markup using flex box
items.body: Now all widgets are absolute. Need to rework markup using flexbox component

Add ability to record sample from plugin
